statements: DELETE FROM medication_sales WHERE medication_id = 1 AND sale_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM medication_sales WHERE quantity_sold > 100 AND medication_name LIKE '%pain%';
DELETE FROM sales WHERE quantity >= 10 AND sale_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM medications WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Pharmaceuticals' AND price > 100.00;
DELETE FROM customers WHERE name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM sales WHERE sale_id = 100 AND quantity < 10;
